scripts.start: npm run build-css && concurrently --kill-others "npm run watch-js" "npm run sass-watch" "ntl dev"
scripts.copy: rm -rf public && mkdir public && cp -r src/* public/
scripts.build: npm run copy && npm run build-js && npm run build-css
scripts.build-css: npm run build-css-main && npm run build-css-single && cp src/spinner.css public/spinner.css && cp src/sq-payment-form.css public/sq-payment-form.css
scripts.build-js: npm run build-cms && npm run build-site && npm run build-cart && npm run build-buy-page && npm run build-success
scripts.build-site: browserify src/js/load-single-product.js -p esmify > public/js/load-single-product.js && browserify src/js/load-products.js -p esmify > public/js/load-products.js
scripts.watch-js: concurrently --kill-others "watchify src/js/load-single-product.js -v -p esmify -o public/js/load-single-product.js" "watchify src/js/load-products.js -v -p esmify -o public/js/load-products.js" "watchify src/js/cart-page.js -v -p esmify -o public/js/cart-page.js" "watchify src/js/buy.js -t babelify --debug -p esmify -o public/js/buy.js" "watchify src/js/success.js -v -t babelify -p esmify -o public/js/success.js"
scripts.test-cms: npm run build-js && browserify test-browser/index.js | htmlify src/admin/index.html | tape-run --static=public --input html | tap-spec
scripts.test-website: browserify test-browser/index.js | htmlify src/index.html | tape-run --static=public --input html | tap-spec
scripts.test-buy-page: browserify -p esmify test-buy/index.js | htmlify test-buy/index.html | tape-run --static=public --input html
